text: Tiago Brandão Rodrigues (born 1977) is a Portuguese politician serving as Minister of Education . He has a PhD in biochemistry from the University of Coimbra. Rodrigues was elected by the Viana do Castelo constituency to the Assembly of the Republic in 2015. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Education ministers of Portugal Category:People from Braga
title: Tiago Brandão Rodrigues
